contactMessages.name: Ali Rahman
contactMessages.subject: Question about registration deadline
contactMessages.message: Hello, I would like to know if the registration deadline can be extended for our team. We are still finalizing our team members. Thank you!

contactMessages.name: Huda Mustafa
contactMessages.subject: Competition venue information
contactMessages.message: Could you please provide more details about the competition venue and accommodation options for teams coming from other cities?

contactMessages.name: Tariq Saeed
contactMessages.subject: Sponsorship inquiry
contactMessages.message: Our company is interested in sponsoring the ACPC event. Who should we contact regarding sponsorship opportunities?

contactMessages.name: Samira Nabil
contactMessages.subject: Past competition problems
contactMessages.message: Is there a repository of past ACPC problems that teams can use for practice? It would be very helpful for our preparation.

contactMessages.name: Walid Hamdan
contactMessages.subject: Technical requirements
contactMessages.message: What programming languages and development environments will be available during the competition?

volunteerApplications.name: Leena Ashour
volunteerApplications.experience: I have experience in social media management and content creation. I've worked on several university events and helped promote them through various social media channels.
volunteerApplications.availability: Available all competition days (Friday-Sunday) and two days before for setup
volunteerApplications.motivation: I'm passionate about competitive programming and want to help make this event successful by documenting and sharing the excitement with the community.

volunteerApplications.name: Fadi Masri
volunteerApplications.experience: I have coordinated logistics for multiple university conferences with 200+ participants. Strong organizational skills and attention to detail.
volunteerApplications.availability: Available for all preparation days and the competition weekend
volunteerApplications.motivation: I love organizing events and ensuring everything runs smoothly. ACPC is a prestigious event and I'd be honored to contribute.

volunteerApplications.name: Jana Qasim
volunteerApplications.experience: Technical background in computer science. I've been a teaching assistant for programming courses and understand the technical needs of competitors.
volunteerApplications.motivation: I want to help create a smooth technical experience for all teams. Having participated in similar competitions, I understand what competitors need.

volunteerApplications.name: Bashar Zahra
volunteerApplications.experience: General volunteer experience at various community events. Quick learner and team player.
volunteerApplications.availability: Available on competition days, Saturday and Sunday
volunteerApplications.motivation: I want to be part of this important academic event and support the talented students participating.

volunteerApplications.name: Rana Fares
volunteerApplications.experience: Photography and videography experience. I've covered several tech events and conferences. Have my own equipment.
volunteerApplications.motivation: I want to capture the energy and passion of ACPC participants and create lasting memories of this event.

contests.name: Syrian Collegiate Programming Contest 2025
contests.description: The annual Syrian Collegiate Programming Contest brings together the brightest minds from universities across Syria to compete in algorithmic problem-solving.
contests.location: Damascus University - Faculty of Informatics Engineering

scheduleEvents.title: Team Registration & Check-in
scheduleEvents.description: Teams register on-site, receive competition materials, and set up their workstations

scheduleEvents.title: Opening Ceremony
scheduleEvents.description: Welcome speech, competition rules, and technical briefing

scheduleEvents.title: Practice Session
scheduleEvents.description: Teams familiarize themselves with the contest environment and submission system

scheduleEvents.title: Lunch Break
scheduleEvents.description: Networking lunch for teams, coaches, and judges

scheduleEvents.title: Day 1 Wrap-up
scheduleEvents.description: Brief standings review and announcements for Day 2

scheduleEvents.title: Workshop: Advanced Algorithms
scheduleEvents.description: Guest speaker workshop on advanced competitive programming techniques

scheduleEvents.title: Final Round Preparation
scheduleEvents.description: Teams prepare for the final round, coaches meeting

scheduleEvents.title: Final Round
scheduleEvents.description: Championship round - Top teams compete for the grand prize

scheduleEvents.title: Lunch & Judging
scheduleEvents.description: Final lunch while judges finalize results

scheduleEvents.title: Closing Ceremony & Awards
scheduleEvents.description: Results announcement, awards presentation, and closing remarks
